alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Quitman; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 7:14PM CDT until June 11 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PHILLIPS...NORTHEASTERN COAHOMA...SOUTHWESTERN TUNICA AND NORTHWESTERN QUITMAN COUNTIES... At 714 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Helena-West Helena, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Helena-West Helena, St Francis National Park, Friars Point, Dundee, Dubbs, Coahoma, Lula, Gerlach Mill, Huma, Moon, Maud, Preston Place, Quarles, Westover, Jeffries, Wycamp, Delta, Roseacres, Matagorda and Hamlin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
